set.name: DMRP-16 The Hundred Kings x Evil King Oni Revolution!!!

card.name: Oratorio, One Who Sings Crescent Moon

property.name: Race
property.value: Angel Command/Gekko Kingdom

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SYMPATHY}: Creature (This creature costs 1 less to summon for each of your creatures in the battle zone. It can't cost 0 or less.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw a card. {OSHIOKIMOON}: Whenever a card leaves your shield zone, you may put a light or darkness creature that costs 3 or less from your hand into the battle zone.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-16 The Hundred Kings x Evil King Oni Revolution!!!

property.name: Race
property.value: Fire Bird/Bikkuri Kingdom

property.name: Rules
property.value: {VIVIDDRAW} {W3} (During your turn, when you draw this creature before you attack, you may reveal it. If you do, you may pay Water 3 to summon this creature this turn.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw 3 cards, then put a card from your hand on the top of your deck. Then skip the rest of the turn. (Immediately start the next player's turn.)

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Race
property.value: Mutopia/Bikkuri Kingdom

property.name: Rules
property.value: {VIVIDDRAW} {F4} (During your turn, when you draw this creature before you attack, you may reveal it. If you do, you may pay Fire 4 to summon this creature this turn.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, each of your creatures gets +6000 power, "speed attacker" and "powered breaker" until the end of the turn. (A creature that has "powered breaker" breaks an additional shield for each 6000 power.) ■ When this creature is destroyed, choose up to 2 of your opponent's creatures that have total power 6000 or less and destroy them.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-16 The Hundred Kings x Evil King Oni Revolution!!!

property.name: Race
property.value: Beast Folk/Bouken Kingdom

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put one of your creatures into your mana zone. If you do, choose one of your opponent's creatures and put it into its owner's mana zone. {ABARECHAIN}: Whenever any of your creatures attacks, if it's the first attack this turn, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Then you may return a card from your mana zone to your hand.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-16 The Hundred Kings x Evil King Oni Revolution!!!

property.name: Race
property.value: Gekko Kingdom

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put each of your shields into your graveyard. Then put one more than the number of cards put into your graveyard this way from the top of your deck into your shields face down.

property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Race
property.value: Team Zero

property.name: Rules
property.value: File:Mugen Climb.png|80px|link=Mugen Climb|text-top Mugen Climb 4 (You may cast this spell from your hand or graveyard by tapping 4 of your creatures and paying Water/Darkness 4:.) ■ Draw a card. ■ Your opponent may skip their next turn. If they don't, you may choose a card from your opponent's hand at random and choose one of their creatures. Your opponent puts them on the bottom of their deck in any order. Then you may put a water or darkness creature from your hand or graveyard into the battle zone. ■ After you cast this spell, put it on the bottom of your deck instead of your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Destroy one of your creatures. Then put a creature that costs 1 more than that creature from your graveyard into the battle zone. That creature gets "speed attacker" until the end of the turn. {ONITIME}: If you and your opponent have a total of 6 or less shields, after you cast this spell from your hand, you may cast this spell from your graveyard for no cost.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: {Kirifudash} {FN10} (At the end of any of your creatures attacks, if that creature breaks a shield while attacking, you may pay Fire/Nature 10 to summon this creature.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top 3 cards of your deck into your mana zone tapped, then put 3 cards of your mana zone on the bottom of your deck in any order. File:Kirifuda Revolution.png|70px|text-top Kirifuda Revolution: During the turn you put this creature into the battle zone with the "Kirifudash" ability, whenever your opponent would put a creature into the battle zone, your opponent puts it into its owner's mana zone instead.

property.value: Gekko Kingdom

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your shield zone face down. Then add one of your shields to your hand. (You can use the "shield trigger" abilities of those shields.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {VIVIDDRAW} {W2|spell} (During your turn, when you draw this creature before you attack, you may reveal it. If you do, you may pay Water 2 | s p e l l to summon this creature this turn.) ■ Return all creatures that cost less than the number of cards in your mana zone to their owner's hand.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-16 The Hundred Kings x Evil King Oni Revolution!!!

property.name: Race
property.value: Team Zero

property.name: Rules
property.value: File:Mugen Climb black.png|80px|link=Mugen Climb|text-top Mugen Climb 2 (You may cast this spell from your hand or graveyard by tapping 2 of your creatures and paying Water 2:.) {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Until the start of your next turn, your opponent can only attack or block with a creature twice each turn. ■ After you cast this spell, put it on the bottom of your deck instead of your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, they attack you if able.

property.value: Funky Knightmare

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ No creatures can be put into a mana zone or shield zone from the battle zone. ■ No creatures can be put into the battle zone from a mana zone or shield zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-16 The Hundred Kings x Evil King Oni Revolution!!!

property.name: Race
property.value: Demonio/Onifuda Kingdom

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever a creature attacks, if you have at least one darkness card and one fire card in your mana zone, you may show this creature from your hand to your opponent and put it on the bottom of your deck. If you do, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 3000 or less. Oniend: When you put this creature into the battle zone, if there is a player that has no shields, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-16 The Hundred Kings x Evil King Oni Revolution!!!

property.name: Race
property.value: Onifuda Kingdom

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of your opponent's cards in the battle zone that costs 3 or less and put it into its owner's graveyard. {ONITIME}: If you and your opponent have a total of 6 or less shields, choose one of your opponent's cards in the battle zone that costs 5 or less and put it into its owner's graveyard.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-16 The Hundred Kings x Evil King Oni Revolution!!!

property.name: Race
property.value: Jokers/Team Kirifuda

property.name: Rules
property.value: {Kirifudash} {N10} (At the end of any of your creatures attacks, if that creature breaks a shield while attacking, you may pay Nature 10 to summon this creature.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may put a Team Kirifuda from among them into your mana zone tapped. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. File:Kirifuda Revolution black.png|70px|text-top Kirifuda Revolution: When you put this creature into the battle zone with the "Kirifudash" ability, put each of your opponent's creatures into their owner's mana zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-16 The Hundred Kings x Evil King Oni Revolution!!!

property.name: Race
property.value: Devil Mask/Gekko Kingdom

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. ■ When this creature leaves the battle zone, add one of your shields to your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield.

property.name: Set

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard. ■ You may put a creature that costs 3 or less from your graveyard or hand. That creature gets "blocker" until the start of your next turn.(You may tap a creature that has "blocker" to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to that creature.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ At the end of each turn, if a creature attacked that turn, that player chooses a shield. That shield's owner puts it into their hand. (You may use the "shield trigger".) {ONITIME}: If you and your opponent have a total of 6 or less shields, neither player can put a card in their shield zone. (Whenever another D2 Field is put into the battle zone, put this D2 Field into your graveyard.)
